tool.name: Cluster MOFA Embeddings

configfiles.configfile: import scanpy as sc import muon as mu import matplotlib from scanpy import tl mdata = mu.read_h5mu('$rna_atac_mofa_input') sc.tl.leiden(mdata, key_added='$key_added', resolution=$resolution, random_state=$random_state, use_weights=$use_weights, n_iterations=$n_iterations ) figure_clustering = sc.pl.umap(mdata, color="$sc_umap_color", legend_loc='$sc_umap_legend_loc', return_fig=True) figure_clustering.savefig("figure_clustering.png") #set $mu_umap_color = ([x.strip() for x in str($mu_umap_color).split(',')]) figure_individual_features = mu.pl.umap(mdata, color=$mu_umap_color, return_fig=True) figure_individual_features.savefig("figure_individual_features.png") mdata.write("rna_atac_mofa_clustering.h5mu")

param.name: resolution
param.label: Coarseness of the clustering
param.help: Higher values lead to more clusters (resolution in sc.tl.leiden)

param.name: random_state
param.label: Random state
param.help: Change the initialization of the optimization (random_state in sc.tl.leiden)

param.name: key_added
param.label: Key under which to add the cluster labels

param.name: n_iterations
param.label: Number of iterations of the Leiden clustering algorithm to perform
param.help: Positive values above 2 define the total number of iterations to perform, -1 has the algorithm run until it reaches its optimal clustering. (n_iterations in sc.tl.leiden)

param.name: sc_umap_color
param.label: Keys for annotations of observations/cells or variables/genes

param.name: mu_umap_color
param.label: Keys for annotations of observations/cells or variables/genes
param.help: Should be separated by comma (color in mu.pl.umap)

tool.help:
**What it does** This tool reads MuData from a h5mu file that contains the data of multiple modalities after multi-omics factorial analysis has been applied to it and performs conventional clustering based on the MOFA embeddingsn using sc.tl.leiden which uses the Leiden algorithm.
This can then be visualized using sc.pl.umap and mu.pl.umap for the individual features from modalities.
